output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an overflow of the total supply due to a missing overflow check.
The transfer function does not check if the target address is not zero, which can lead to a loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check if the target address is not zero, which can lead to a loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check if the spender is not zero, which can allow unauthorized transfers.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint tokens at will, devaluing the token.
